concept.description: Not useable, no support, not open to feedback, unstable API.

experimental.description: Useable, some support, not open to feedback, unstable API.

prototype.description: Useable, some support, open to feedback, unstable API.

stable.description: Useable, full support, open to feedback, stable API.

deprecated.description: Useable as of a fixed, past date, no support, not open to feedback, stable API as of a fixed, past date.
